official-title.#text:
To provide that a former Member of Congress or former
		  Congressional employee who receives compensation as a lobbyist shall not be
		  eligible for retirement benefits or certain other Federal
		  benefits.

short-title.#text:
End the Congressional Revolving Door
			 Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Prohibition relating
			 to certain Federal benefits for a former Member of Congress or former
			 Congressional employee who receives compensation as a lobbyist

text.#text:
A covered individual
			 who is a registered lobbyist shall not be eligible for any covered benefits for
			 any month—
